actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability of the Ka Iwi shoreline on the island of Oahu, Hawaii, for inclusion in the National Park System.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to study and report to the Congress on the suitability of including the Ka Iwi shoreline on the island of Oahu, Hawaii, in the National Park System. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability of the Ka Iwi shoreline on the island of Oahu, Hawaii, for inclusion in the National Park System.
